Data Science Cookbook¶

데이터 사이언스관련 주요 예제들을 공유하는 공간입니다.

  • Data Preparation (EDA(탐색적 자료 분석, Exploratory Data Analysis))
    • Data Description(데이터 서술)
    • Missing Value(결측치)
    • Descriptive Statistics(기술적 통계)
    • Outlier(이상치)
    • Feature Selection(특징선택)
    • Feature Extraction(특징추출)
    • Feature Transformation(특징변환)

  • Model

    • Record Data

      • Supervised Learning
        • Regression
        • Classificaion
      • Unsupervised Learning
        • Clustering
      • Recommendation

    • Graph-based Data

    • Ordered Data

  • Evaluation

    • Classification
      • Confusion Matrix (Precision, Recall, F-Score)
    • Regression
      • RMSE(Root Mean Squared Error)
      • R-Square
